item.title: The Mask of the Red Death
item.description: "The 'Red Death' had long devastated the country. No pestilence had ever been so fatal, or so hideous. Blood was its Avatar and its seal â€” the redness and the horror of blood. There were sharp pains, and sudden dizziness, and then profuse bleeding at the pores, with dissolution.""With such precautions the courtiers might bid defiance to contagion. The external world could take care of itself.""All these and security were within.
